entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 6.
